title: AI-powered semiconductors: Pioneering the future of the automotive industry
content: From improving vehicle efficiency to enabling real-time decision-making and intelligent transportation systems, advanced semiconductor technology is paving the way for a safer, smarter, and more efficient future of mobility.
summary: From improving vehicle efficiency to enabling real-time decision-making and intelligent transportation systems, advanced semiconductor technology is paving the way for a safer, smarter, and more efficient future of mobility.

title: Daegu hosts inaugural FIX Innovation Awards, honouring pioneers in mobility, robotics, and ABB technologies
content: Daegu Metropolitan City and EXCO honored 36 companies at the inaugural FIX Innovation Awards for their technologies in mobility, IT, and robotics. Awardees will receive support through accelerator programs, ESG consulting, and international networking opportunities.
summary: Daegu Metropolitan City and EXCO honored 36 companies at the inaugural FIX Innovation Awards for their technologies in mobility, IT, and robotics. Awardees will receive support through accelerator programs, ESG consulting, and international networking opportunities.

title: Bosch Q2 revenue rises 6.4% to INR 4,394 crore on strong automotive sales
content: Bosch Limited witnessed revenue growth in the second quarter. The company's revenue reached INR 4,394 crores. Sales in passenger cars and off-highway segments drove this growth. The Power Solutions business, a major contributor, grew by 5.7%.  Bosch Limited is optimistic about future growth, anticipating continued demand across segments.
summary: Bosch Limited witnessed revenue growth in the second quarter. The company's revenue reached INR 4,394 crores. Sales in passenger cars and off-highway segments drove this growth. The Power Solutions business, a major contributor, grew by 5.7%.  Bosch Limited is optimistic about future growth, anticipating continued demand across segments.

title: Demand for ADAS surges amid growing road safety concerns in India
content: A new survey reveals that Indians are increasingly concerned about road safety. Many Indians have experienced road accidents in recent years. Two-wheeler riders are particularly vulnerable. The survey finds strong support for ADAS, but adoption remains low. Most respondents believe ADAS is crucial for safety and would consider purchasing ADAS-equipped vehicles.
summary: A new survey reveals that Indians are increasingly concerned about road safety. Many Indians have experienced road accidents in recent years. Two-wheeler riders are particularly vulnerable. The survey finds strong support for ADAS, but adoption remains low. Most respondents believe ADAS is crucial for safety and would consider purchasing ADAS-equipped vehicles.

title: Odisha startup launches fully autonomous logistics drone service
content: "Today's launch of Air Orca marks an important advancement for India's logistics sector and for us as an Odisha-based company", said Satyabrata Sathapathy, CEO of Bon V Aero said on Saturday.
summary: "Today's launch of Air Orca marks an important advancement for India's logistics sector and for us as an Odisha-based company", said Satyabrata Sathapathy, CEO of Bon V Aero said on Saturday.

title: MapmyIndia forms JV with Hyundai Autoever to expand Southeast Asian market
content: MapmyIndia's board approved a joint venture with Hyundai Autoever, where MapmyIndia will hold a 40% stake with a USD 4 million investment. This joint venture, named PT Terra Link Technologies, will be based in Indonesia and focus on providing map-based solutions for automotive OEMs and other businesses across Southeast Asia.
summary: MapmyIndia's board approved a joint venture with Hyundai Autoever, where MapmyIndia will hold a 40% stake with a USD 4 million investment. This joint venture, named PT Terra Link Technologies, will be based in Indonesia and focus on providing map-based solutions for automotive OEMs and other businesses across Southeast Asia.

title: IIT-I's innovative thermal management solution for EVs
content: In EVs, maintaining an optimal battery temperature is crucial. When lithium-ion batteries overheat, they face severe risks like thermal runaway, which can lead to catastrophic failures.
summary: In EVs, maintaining an optimal battery temperature is crucial. When lithium-ion batteries overheat, they face severe risks like thermal runaway, which can lead to catastrophic failures.

title: California agency boosts reporting requirements for autonomous vehicle incidents
content: In June, GM self-driving unit Cruise agreed to pay the maximum USD 112,500 penalty to the CPUC for failing to promptly provide complete information to the commission about a serious crash involving one of its robotaxis last year.
summary: In June, GM self-driving unit Cruise agreed to pay the maximum USD 112,500 penalty to the CPUC for failing to promptly provide complete information to the commission about a serious crash involving one of its robotaxis last year.

title: AI-based system to check traffic violations, initially at 500 signals
content: Officials stated that govt had already initiated the process by issuing a request for proposal to identify a suitable agency with expertise in providing AI-based clear visibility high-resolution cameras for detecting traffic violations, complete with analytics, a mobile or tablet-based app for e-challan, and a monitoring dashboard.
summary: Officials stated that govt had already initiated the process by issuing a request for proposal to identify a suitable agency with expertise in providing AI-based clear visibility high-resolution cameras for detecting traffic violations, complete with analytics, a mobile or tablet-based app for e-challan, and a monitoring dashboard.

title: German auto supplier seeks US nod to deploy autonomous buses on US roads
content: The petition, which will not see final action before President Donald Trump takes office, could shed light on how the new administration approaches self-driving vehicles. NHTSA has taken a cautious approach in recent years.
summary: The petition, which will not see final action before President Donald Trump takes office, could shed light on how the new administration approaches self-driving vehicles. NHTSA has taken a cautious approach in recent years.

title: Epsilon and Daejoo collaborate to enhance EV battery performance with silicon-graphite composite
content: EAM, a leading global manufacturer of LiB anode and cathode materials, and Daejoo, a top global producer of Silicon Anode Materials for LiB, are collaborating to develop a Graphite-rich composite. Nagase, a Japanese trading company, played a crucial role in establishing the partnership. The joint effort aims to create a Gen-1 Graphite-rich Silicon composite exceeding the performance of existing LiB materials.
summary: EAM, a leading global manufacturer of LiB anode and cathode materials, and Daejoo, a top global producer of Silicon Anode Materials for LiB, are collaborating to develop a Graphite-rich composite. Nagase, a Japanese trading company, played a crucial role in establishing the partnership. The joint effort aims to create a Gen-1 Graphite-rich Silicon composite exceeding the performance of existing LiB materials.

title: Mahindra Tractors launches AI-powered virtual tractor drive to celebrate 60th anniversary
content: India's top tractor brand, Mahindra Tractors, introduced a virtual tractor driving experience. The initiative allowed customers to create personalised videos of themselves driving Mahindra tractors. This innovative campaign used AI-driven face augmentation technology. It aimed to connect with the farming community during the festive season.  Over 250,000 people have already participated in this unique experience.
summary: India's top tractor brand, Mahindra Tractors, introduced a virtual tractor driving experience. The initiative allowed customers to create personalised videos of themselves driving Mahindra tractors. This innovative campaign used AI-driven face augmentation technology. It aimed to connect with the farming community during the festive season.  Over 250,000 people have already participated in this unique experience.

title: FIX2024: Daegu's bold vision to transform into a global tech hub
content: FIX2024 is Daegu’s proactive step toward securing its place in a fast-evolving, tech-driven world. Although Daegu has a strong legacy in automotive and textiles, change is needed. Mayor Hong Jun-pyo, upon taking office in 2022, committed to restructuring Daegu’s traditional manufacturing to focus on five key industries: mobility, AI, big data, robotics, and digital healthcare. FIX2024 is not only a reflection of our past progress but a stepping stone for the future. Our objective is to accelerate growth by fostering competition and collaboration among companies in these fields.
summary: FIX2024 is Daegu’s proactive step toward securing its place in a fast-evolving, tech-driven world. Although Daegu has a strong legacy in automotive and textiles, change is needed. Mayor Hong Jun-pyo, upon taking office in 2022, committed to restructuring Daegu’s traditional manufacturing to focus on five key industries: mobility, AI, big data, robotics, and digital healthcare. FIX2024 is not only a reflection of our past progress but a stepping stone for the future. Our objective is to accelerate growth by fostering competition and collaboration among companies in these fields.

title: Tessolve acquires Dream Chip Technologies at INR 400 crore
content: Tessolve, an Indian semiconductor engineering solutions company, will acquire Dream Chip Technologies, a German chip design firm. The deal is worth up to INR 400 crore. This acquisition will make Tessolve a leading provider of turnkey design solutions for advanced chips. The deal will also expand Tessolve's presence in Europe.
summary: Tessolve, an Indian semiconductor engineering solutions company, will acquire Dream Chip Technologies, a German chip design firm. The deal is worth up to INR 400 crore. This acquisition will make Tessolve a leading provider of turnkey design solutions for advanced chips. The deal will also expand Tessolve's presence in Europe.

title: Hero Electronix, backed by Suman Kant Munjal, plans to sell 30% stake in chip design firm Tessove
content: Two years after its last capital round, majority shareholder Hero Electronix is looking to generate USD 120-150 million ( INR 1,000-1,260 crore), said the people cited above, pegging Tessolve’s value at USD 400-450 million ( INR 3,300-3,800 crore).
summary: Two years after its last capital round, majority shareholder Hero Electronix is looking to generate USD 120-150 million ( INR 1,000-1,260 crore), said the people cited above, pegging Tessolve’s value at USD 400-450 million ( INR 3,300-3,800 crore).

title: FIX 2024 hosts ‘Global Media Pick TOP3 Awards’ for 33 best innovators
content: FIX 2024, held at EXCO in Daegu, focused on future technologies such as mobility, robotics, and ABB (AI, Big Data, Blockchain). Global media representatives, including Clipset from Spain, SINA from China, and Business Today from Malaysia, spent two days evaluating the exhibiting companies before selecting the top innovators.
summary: FIX 2024, held at EXCO in Daegu, focused on future technologies such as mobility, robotics, and ABB (AI, Big Data, Blockchain). Global media representatives, including Clipset from Spain, SINA from China, and Business Today from Malaysia, spent two days evaluating the exhibiting companies before selecting the top innovators.

title: FIX 2024 showcases advanced technology innovations and opportunities worth USD 1.945 bn
content: The “2024 Future Innovation-tech eXpo” (FIX 2024) emphasised its theme, “A Better Future Shaped by Innovation Technology,” by welcoming 463 startups and global corporations. These participants occupied 2,071 booths within the expo, collectively forming an ecosystem designed to drive future industries.
summary: The “2024 Future Innovation-tech eXpo” (FIX 2024) emphasised its theme, “A Better Future Shaped by Innovation Technology,” by welcoming 463 startups and global corporations. These participants occupied 2,071 booths within the expo, collectively forming an ecosystem designed to drive future industries.

title: China's DeepRoute.ai raises USD 100 mln as smart driving adoption speeds up
content: The Shenzhen-based startup expects nearly 200,000 cars to be equipped with its advanced assisted driving system on Chinese roads by the end of 2025, CEO Maxwell Zhou told Reuters in an interview, up from about 20,000 now.
summary: The Shenzhen-based startup expects nearly 200,000 cars to be equipped with its advanced assisted driving system on Chinese roads by the end of 2025, CEO Maxwell Zhou told Reuters in an interview, up from about 20,000 now.

title: Cyborgs & hyperloops: The wait continues
content: The first flying car was approved by regulators in 1956, but here we are, still stuck on the road. Hyperloops require route-length concrete tubes propped up on towers in the sky – as technically infeasible as the hovering trains once imagined too. Impressive as today’s AI applications are, we don’t have artificial general intelligence, the ability to make a machine think.
summary: The first flying car was approved by regulators in 1956, but here we are, still stuck on the road. Hyperloops require route-length concrete tubes propped up on towers in the sky – as technically infeasible as the hovering trains once imagined too. Impressive as today’s AI applications are, we don’t have artificial general intelligence, the ability to make a machine think.

title: Hyundai Motor unveils new hydrogen-based EV concept
content: Hyundai Motor on Thursday unveiled the concept of its upcoming passenger hydrogen fuel cell electric vehicle (FCEV) named Initium that comes with an extended driving range and ample hydrogen fuel storage capacity.
summary: Hyundai Motor on Thursday unveiled the concept of its upcoming passenger hydrogen fuel cell electric vehicle (FCEV) named Initium that comes with an extended driving range and ample hydrogen fuel storage capacity.
